title: House still bank
description: house dark brown; roof reddish brown, light brown dormer with hole on front and back roof; dark brown outlined double front door with painted dark brown handle; lines on doors create four triangles, half circle window above front door; eight sketched light brown multipaned windows with half circle above; front two, sides three each, double windows each side; base dark brown lines create bricks, steps in front; coin slot below front dormer
